description.narrative: (i) The project will contribute to the development of two frontier regions in Mexico: Oaxaca and Guerrero, where economic stimulators are scarce and very much needed. (ii) Creation of both direct and indirect jobs, especially in Oaxaca where a new production line will be established. (iii) Promotion of sustainable forestry practices as Puertas Finas, provides technical and logistical support to the communities from where it supplies part of its pine wood. (iv) The Company is expected to continue improving its environmental performance, thus reducing its overall environmental footprint. (v) Company''s improvements in energy efficiency of its existing operations.

The project will expand operations of Holding Montealban SA de CV ( Puertas Finas or the Company), a leading company in the production of doors, contract woodwork and plywood in Mexico. The project includes: (i) implementing its 2012-2016 capital expenditures program; (ii) satisfying working capital needs; and (iii) refinancing of existing debt. Puertas Finas capital expenditures program aims at the modernization, expansion and energy efficient improvements of its existing operations. The Company has production facilities in various parts of Mexico and its headquarters are located in Oaxaca.
